problem_names:
lemma weakCongTransE:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  obtains P'' P''' where "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P''" and "P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'''" and "P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'"

lemma weakCongTransI:
  fixes P    :: ccs
  and   P''  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>    :: act
  and   P''' :: ccs
  and   P'   :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P''"
  and     "P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'''"
  and     "P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'"

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

lemma transitionWeakCongTransition:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

lemma weakCongAction:
  fixes a :: name
  and   P :: ccs

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P"

lemma weakCongSum1:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

lemma weakCongSum2:
  fixes Q  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   Q' :: ccs
  and   P  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

  shows "P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

lemma weakCongPar1:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q"

lemma weakCongPar2:
  fixes Q  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   Q' :: ccs
  and   P  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P \<parallel> Q'"

lemma weakCongSync:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "Q \<Longrightarrow>(coAction \<alpha>) \<prec> Q'"
  and     "\<alpha> \<noteq> \<tau>"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<tau> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q'"

lemma weakCongRes:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   x  :: name

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "x \<sharp> \<alpha>"

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P'"

lemma weakCongRepl:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "!P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
translations:
lemma weakCongTransE:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  obtains P'' P''' where "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P''" and "P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'''" and "P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<And>P'' P'''.
        \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
         P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
         P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> thesis) \<Longrightarrow>
    thesis
using assms
by(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)

lemma weakCongTransI:
  fixes P    :: ccs
  and   P''  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>    :: act
  and   P''' :: ccs
  and   P'   :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P''"
  and     "P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'''"
  and     "P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'"

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P''
  P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'''
  P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
by(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)

lemma transitionWeakCongTransition:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
by(force simp add: weakCongTrans_def)

lemma weakCongAction:
  fixes a :: name
  and   P :: ccs

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<alpha>.P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P

by(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)
  (blast intro: Action tauChainRefl)

lemma weakCongSum1:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
apply(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            P \<oplus>
                            Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
apply(case_tac "P=P''")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'; P = P''\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            P \<oplus>
                            Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
 2. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'; P \<noteq> P''\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            P \<oplus>
                            Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
apply(force simp add: tauChain_def dest: Sum1)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'; P \<noteq> P''\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            P \<oplus>
                            Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
by(force intro: tauChainSum1)

lemma weakCongSum2:
  fixes Q  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   Q' :: ccs
  and   P  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

  shows "P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'
apply(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            P \<oplus>
                            Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q')
apply(case_tac "Q=P''")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'; Q = P''\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            P \<oplus>
                            Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q')
 2. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'; Q \<noteq> P''\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            P \<oplus>
                            Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q')
apply(force simp add: tauChain_def dest: Sum2)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q'; Q \<noteq> P''\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            P \<oplus>
                            Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> Q')
by(force intro: tauChainSum2)

lemma weakCongPar1:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q

by(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)
  (blast dest: tauChainPar1 Par1)

lemma weakCongPar2:
  fixes Q  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   Q' :: ccs
  and   P  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P \<parallel> Q'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P \<parallel> Q'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P \<parallel> Q'

by(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)
  (blast dest: tauChainPar2 Par2)

lemma weakCongSync:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "Q \<Longrightarrow>(coAction \<alpha>) \<prec> Q'"
  and     "\<alpha> \<noteq> \<tau>"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<tau> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<tau> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
  Q \<Longrightarrow>coAction \<alpha> \<prec> Q'
  \<alpha> \<noteq> \<tau>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<tau> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q'
apply(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)
apply(rule_tac x= "P'' \<parallel> P''a" in exI)
apply auto
apply(blast dest: tauChainPar1 tauChainPar2)
apply(rule_tac x="P''' \<parallel> P'''a" in exI)
apply auto
apply(rule Comm)
apply auto
apply(rule_tac P'="P' \<parallel> P'''a" in tauChainAppend)
by(blast dest: tauChainPar1 tauChainPar2)+

lemma weakCongRes:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   x  :: name

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "x \<sharp> \<alpha>"

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
  x \<sharp> \<alpha>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P'

by(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)
  (blast dest: tauChainRes Res)

lemma weakCongRepl:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "!P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
apply(auto simp add: weakCongTrans_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
apply(case_tac "P'' = P \<parallel> !P")

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
        P'' = P \<parallel> !P\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
 2. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
        P'' \<noteq> P \<parallel> !P\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
apply auto

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<parallel> !P \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
 2. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
        P'' \<noteq> P \<parallel> !P\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
apply(force intro: Bang simp add: tauChain_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>P'' P'''.
       \<lbrakk>P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'';
        P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''';
        P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P';
        P'' \<noteq> P \<parallel> !P\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P''.
                            !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P'' \<and>
                            (\<exists>P'''.
                                P'' \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P''' \<and>
                                P''' \<Longrightarrow>\<^sub>\<tau> P')
by(force intro: tauChainRepl)
end
